admissions.answer: To apply, use iCampus registration. After registering, your account syncs here automatically.

email.answer: For UEAB email setup, visit the ITS Office at Main Campus or email odel@ueab.ac.ke.

contact.answer: You can call +254 714 333 111 or email info@ueab.ac.ke. Our campus map is available on Contact.

programs.answer: Explore programs across 5 UEAB schools. You can browse all courses here.

events.answer: See upcoming events and details on our Events Calendar.

news.answer: Latest news and announcements are posted here.
